Heat advisory in effect in area

Egypt's first democratically elected president was overthrown by the military yesterday, ousted by the same kind of Arab Spring uprising that brought the Islamist leader to power.

'Pay It Forward' plan would let Oregon students attend state schools for free

Under the proposal, students could attend the state's public universities free but would have 3 percent of their post-graduation paychecks deducted for 25 years.
